title: Lux Art
body:
Not by me, but she is nervous to post herself and wants opinions and any suggestions.
http://i.imgur.com/U9GzdeD.jpg

replies.body: My advice:  stop being nervous 'cause that's awesome.
Thanks ! And yeah I suck I'm sorry lol... Sorry for the late answers he posted the thread super late for me so I was asleep.
Sound advice.
This is so good!
All around it looks pretty nice. Shes a little to fat in some areas though.
The legs do become a little disproportionate to the upper body and feet. Probably just an oversight from all the flamboyant colors in the waist, drawing the artist away.

Hi ! I'm the artist of this piece.

I totally agree after reading what you said, I had actually a base body that I planned on using for whatever then this skin got released and I simply didn't change the proportions. I'm taking notes for next time though ! Thanks a lot.
np,
Its honestly meh. ive seen better ones but good job
Thanks ! But I'd have preferred if you just looked at the piece objectively instead of just comparing it to others you've seen. Thanks for taking the time to write that anyway.

The art is good, but I'm more impressed with how positive the artist has reacted to the feedback. Sometimes it can be hard to accept criticism, yet she has taken it in stride like a true Lux fan. Anyway, most everyone else has already expressed how I feel about this piece, so I'll just leave it at that. Keep it up!

How can you be nervous when you're being internet anonymous wtf?
...Unless OP is actually the person who drew it....
DUN DUN DUUUUUUN

It's already been said but, the proportions below her waist (thighs, legs, etc.) are off and maybe it's just me but her shoulders look a bit too broad. Besides that.. it looks great, nice job {{champion:99}}

I like the colors. The style itself is nice, but it needs some work. You can tell her thighs are well... Awkward, and they honestly look like thunder thighs. The shifty eye look also distracts from the other nice aspects of the artwork. The upper torso is very well draw, and the details on her staff are quite lovely. As an artist myself, I can also tell you I know the hand trick~ placing the hands/hand behind the back because hands are a bitchhhhhhhhhhhhhhh to draw. You shouldn't do this, you'll only get better the more you try (: This is a nice first attempt, but I think it could use some improvements! Good job

Hi and thanks ! I've noticed that the thighs are the overall least favorite part, I'm taking it in consideration. And the hands are drawn but they're just hidden. I don't really have any grudge against drawing them but it just happen that one was hidden lol. Anyway thank you so much for taking the time to write all of this !
ask her to do magical girl taric next
Hi ! And maybe lol but I suck with guys, I've been asked to do Magical Girl Garen too.

Yeah her thighs are too large. And as a "sexy" skin, her outfit and body should be the focus of the picture, not her staff; its blocking her. 
But everything else is good. Colors, technique... Its incredible.

Hi and thanks ! But I'm sorry I'm going to have to disagree with you, I don't think it's a sexy skin at all. Senshi's are not supposed to be "sexy" and Lux doesn't go with this. She's cute but not sexy. Still thank you for taking your time to write that !
she's looking at her staff like she wants to eat it. maybe it's tasty i dunno
Lmao maybe ;).

It looks excellent. The lighting and colors are especially well executed.

As a bit of constructive criticism, it's a bit curvier than lux is usually portrayed.

But very well done regardless.

Thanks ! I'm the artist of that piece. I answered already but I'm taking notes. And thanks again for your critics, I really almost never get those makes me happier than the compliments. Thanks again for taking your time to write that.

Maybe you could make it look like Lux before saying it's Lux.

Just a suggestion.

Because that honestly looks more like some random girl at an anime convention.
Hi ! I can see why you feel that way it's probably because she isn't as skinny, that's a mistake on my part, I noticed now and will be taking this in consideration for next time. Thanks.
YAAASSS! IT LOOKS SO GOOD! THAT'S WONDERFUL! YAAAASSSS! POST MORE ARTWORK! :O
Thanks !
This is awesome! Tell her to not be nervous because there is real talent here!
Personally, the wand feels way too big.  Unless it is going to be redesigned at a later time as a staff, then there is no real reason to have it so large.

This is really good looking! :) I'm not too good at critiquing, but the yellow streak on top doesn't really look good. The one on the bottom looks nice because it's mixed with all the pink. But I don't really know how you could fix something like that. :/
It looks cute ;-; I like it^^ Good job c:
Good appearance but does have some noted details that need to be worked on, 8.6/10 Good effort, I'm also working on mine as well.
Thanks ! I'm still learning of course. And I'd love to see your fan art once you finish it ! Either add me or post it on the boards :) !

> [{quoted}](name=Amy Khal,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=4gs4Phjv,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2015-05-07T11:21:01.659+0000)
>
> Thanks ! I'm still learning of course. And I'd love to see your fan art once you finish it ! Either add me or post it on the boards :) !

Roger that, I'll keep that in mind. ^_^
Awesome.
Thanks !
Thanks !
This get 2 Double Rainbow explanations (This is good grade)
What does it mean...? Thanks !
Very well done, I will say that I think she should be a little taller though, she kinda looks squished.
Hi ! Thanks a lot I'm taking notes for next time !
Wow. Beautiful ^^

Art is good, I'm more of a fan of a more "3D" looking art myself...
Not CGI stuff just a more flushed out art like uh...

http://images6.fanpop.com/image/photos/36300000/League-of-legends-image-league-of-legends-36321656-960-540.jpg
